sources.title: Winter Light
sources.description: https://web.archive.org/web/20230203061854/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Winter_Light https://web.archive.org/web/20230318052115/https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057358/ The source file (*.mkv) contains one subtitle track (English) and two audio tracks (Swedish and English). You can use this M3U file to load the source file into your local media player, such as VLC or mpv . For VLC, go to A udio > Audio T rack > Track 2 -  [English] ; or Subti t le > Sub  T rack > Track 1 - [English] . For mpv, Shift+3 to toggle to Audio: (2) eng ; or 'v' to toggle subtitles on/off and 'j' to cycle through to "Subtitles: (1) eng" .

metadata.Plot: On a cold winter's Sunday, the pastor of a small rural church (Tomas Ericsson) performs service for a tiny congregation; though he is suffering from a cold and a severe crisis of faith. After the service, he attempts to console a fisherman (Jonas Persson) who is tormented by anxiety, but Tomas can only speak about his own troubled relationship with God. A school teacher (Maerta Lundberg) offers Tomas her love as consolation for his loss of faith. But Tomas resists her love as desperately as she offers it to him. This is the second in Bergman's trilogy of films dealing with man's relationship with God.
metadata.Actors: Ingrid Thulin, Gunnar Björnstrand, Gunnel Lindblom
